alert.note: Alert for Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 23 at 10:56PM MST until November 24 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 14 inches across the southeast portions of the range. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains West and Wind River Mountains East. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult through Friday, including over South Pass.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West
